section.p:
If you have the codeword Aloft, immediately.
If not, read on.

You come across a strange sight. A man lies staked out on the ground, asleep. Blue energy crackles up and down his body, and a hefty-looking hammer, glowing red, is still attached to his belt. It is Sul Veneris, the one you have come to free.

As you are about to lift the stakes, a whistling, keening blast of ferocious wind engulfs you. You are surrounded by whirling storm demons - vaguely man-shaped creatures of thunderous energy which try to sweep you into the air and off the edge of the peak.
You try to recite the rituals of dismissal associated with such demons. .
